member.name: M:MilNet.Web.Mvc.Common.PropertyHelper.#ctor(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a fast property helper. This constructor does not cache the helper.

member.name: M:MilNet.Web.Mvc.Common.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertySetter``1(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property setter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:MilNet.Web.Mvc.Common.PropertyHelper.GetProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the underlying type.
member.param: the instance to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: a cached array of all public property getters from the underlying type of this instance.

member.name: M:MilNet.Web.Mvc.Common.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.
